writing_prompt: When strange blue lights and rumors of witches haunt the local graveyard, Sherlock Holmes sets out to uncover the truth—only to find Mrs. Hudson and her broom may have already solved the mystery.

metadata.story_name: Have Yourself A Very Werewolf Christmas

writing_prompt: When your werewolf partner insists that Father Christmas will visit them after the full moon, you decide to make their dream come true—Santa suit, presents, and all.
At Mycroft Holmes' Winter Wonderland, the staff in animal costumes are causing more chaos than the visitors, and it's only a matter of time before someone brings out the harpoon.
Sherlock Holmes encounters a peculiar man called the Doctor, who claims to be searching for a missing cat that isn’t really a cat—what unfolds is a mystery that defies logic, time, and space.

When Inspector Slack seeks Miss Marple's insight on a seemingly straightforward murder, her sharp observations and unexpected comparisons reveal that nothing is ever as simple as it seems. What hidden truths will she uncover this time?

metadata.story_name: Like A Squirrel but Without the Tail

writing_prompt: While out for a winter stroll, a curious ferret stumbles upon a hand-drawn treasure map and teams up with a little girl to uncover its biscuit-shaped secrets.
On Christmas morning, you find yourself unwrapping gifts with a werewolf who has a penchant for art, music, and classic holiday films—what thoughtful presents do you give to make his tail wag?

Sherlock Holmes never imagined his latest case would involve dressing as a giant mint-green heart and wandering through a theme park called Wonderland. But when a mystery unfolds among the costumed chaos, can he solve it before the day ends—or before he loses his patience entirely?

A new recruit's outdated views and inability to read the room threaten to derail the delicate balance of a high-stakes intelligence team—how far will the team go to protect their dynamic before it all falls apart?

After a mysterious event wipes out most of London overnight, the midwives and nuns of Nonnatus House must navigate a shattered world, using their skills and resilience to bring hope and healing to the survivors.
